mapper.select: /*boardList*/ SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') REGDATE, TO_CHAR(UPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') UPDATEDATE, RECOMMEND, INQUIRY FROM BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT BNO, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') REGDATE, RECOMMEND, INQUIRY FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{BNO}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET recommend = recommend+1 WHERE BNO = #{BNO}
UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, CONTENT = #{CONTENT}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE BNO= #{BNO}
UPDATE BOARD SET INQUIRY = NVL(INQUIRY,0)+1 WHERE INQUIRY= ${INQUIRY}
